section.p: The common notion of procedure is broader than that specified by the HL7 Version 3 Reference Information Model (RIM). Therefore procedure templates can be represented with various RIM classes: act (e.g., dressing change), observation (e.g., EEG), procedure (e.g., splenectomy). This template represents procedures that result in new information about the patient that cannot be classified as a procedure according to the HL7 RIM. Examples of these procedures are diagnostic imaging procedures, EEGs, and EKGs.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-8238, CONF:1098-10520, CONF:1098-32507 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.13"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Procedure Activity Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.13)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1098-8237)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] targetSiteCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Site 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-8250)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-8245), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProcedureAct statusCode 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.22 STATIC 2014-04-23 (CONF:1098-32365)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:1098-16846)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-8272, CONF:1098-8273, CONF:1098-31394)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Instruction2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-8276, CONF:1098-8277, CONF:1098-15906)

Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Medication Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16:2014-06-09)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer such that it (CONF:1098-8251)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:1098-8252)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8253, R2.0=CONF:1098-8253)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:1098-8254)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:1098-8255)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:8257, R2.0=CONF:1098-8257)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] name (CONF:8258, R2.0=CONF:1098-8258)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:8260, R2.0=CONF:1098-8260)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:8259, R2.0=CONF:1098-8259)

SHOULD contain [1..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-32478)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32470, CONF:1098-32471, CONF:1098-32472)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Reaction Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.9:2014-06-09)
entryRelationship with target class Instruction2 SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" true (CONF:1098-8274)
@code SHOULD be selected from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:1098-19202)
@code MAY be selected from CPT-4 (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12) or ICD10 PCS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4) or CDT-2 (Code System: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.13) (CONF:1098-19202)
SHALL conform to Procedure Activity Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.13)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8282, R2.0=CONF:1098-8282)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1098-8237)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8239, R2.0=CONF:1098-8239)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8240, R2.0=CONF:1098-19197)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-8245), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProcedureAct statusCode 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.22 STATIC 2014-04-23 (CONF:1098-32365)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:8248, R2.0=CONF:1098-8248)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] targetSiteCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Site 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-8250)

MAY contain [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:8261, CONF:15904, R2.0=CONF:1098-8261, R2.0=CONF:1098-15904)
Conforms to Service Delivery Location (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.32)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8264, R2.0=CONF:1098-8264)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8266, R2.0=CONF:1098-8266)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:8265, R2.0=CONF:1098-8265)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] encounter such that it (CONF:8267, R2.0=CONF:1098-8267)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ENC" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8268, R2.0=CONF:1098-8268)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8269, R2.0=CONF:1098-8269)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:8270, R2.0=CONF:1098-8270)
MAY satisfy: Set the encounter ID to the ID of an encounter in another section to signify they are the same encounter. (CONF:16847, R2.0=CONF:1098-16847)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-8272, CONF:1098-8273, CONF:1098-31394)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Instruction2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20:2014-06-09)

Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Medication Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16:2014-06-09)

SHOULD contain [1..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-32478)

Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP

@code SHOULD be selected from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96), and MAY be selected from CPT-4 (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12), ICD10 PCS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4) (CONF:19202)
code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:8242, R2.0=CONF:1098-19198)
originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15901, R2.0=CONF:1098-19199)
reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15902, R2.0=CONF:1098-19200)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15903, R2.0=CONF:1098-19201)
methodCode SHALL NOT conflict with the method inherent in Procedure / code (CONF:8249, R2.0=CONF:1098-8249)
entryRelationship with target class encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8266, R2.0=CONF:1098-8266)

participant with target class Service Delivery Location SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" Location (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) STATIC (CONF:8262, R2.0=CONF:1098-8262)
entryRelationship with target class Instructions SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8274)
entryRelationship with target class Instruction2 SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" true (CONF:1098-8274)
@code SHOULD be selected from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:1098-19202)
@code MAY be selected from CPT-4 (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12) or ICD10 PCS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4) or CDT-2 (Code System: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.13) (CONF:1098-19202)

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:10520 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.13"

Consol Procedure Activity Observation @code SHOULD be selected from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96), and MAY be selected from CPT-4 (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12), ICD10 PCS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4) (CONF:19202)
Consol Procedure Activity Observation code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:8242, R2.0=CONF:1098-19198)
Consol Procedure Activity Observation originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15901, R2.0=CONF:1098-19199)
Consol Procedure Activity Observation reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15902, R2.0=CONF:1098-19200)

Consol Procedure Activity Observation reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15903, R2.0=CONF:1098-19201)
Consol Procedure Activity Observation methodCode SHALL NOT conflict with the method inherent in Procedure / code (CONF:8249, R2.0=CONF:1098-8249)
Consol Procedure Activity Observation entryRelationship with target class encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8266, R2.0=CONF:1098-8266)

Consol Procedure Activity Observation participant with target class Service Delivery Location SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" Location (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) STATIC (CONF:8262, R2.0=CONF:1098-8262)
Consol Procedure Activity Observation entryRelationship with target class Instructions SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8274)
SHALL conform to CDA Observation
Consol Procedure Activity Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8282, R2.0=CONF:1098-8282)
Consol Procedure Activity Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MoodCodeEvnInt 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.18 STATIC 2014-09-01 (CONF:8237)
Consol Procedure Activity Observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8239, R2.0=CONF:1098-8239)
Consol Procedure Activity Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8240, R2.0=CONF:1098-19197)
Consol Procedure Activity Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProcedureActStatusCode 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.22 DYNAMIC (CONF:8245)
Consol Procedure Activity Observation SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:8246, R2.0=CONF:1098-8246)

Consol Procedure Activity Observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Act Priority 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16866 DYNAMIC (CONF:8247, R2.0=CONF:1098-8247)
Consol Procedure Activity Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:16846)
Consol Procedure Activity Observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:8248, R2.0=CONF:1098-8248)

Consol Procedure Activity Observation SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] targetSiteCode (CONF:8250), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Site 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 DYNAMIC (CONF:10121)
Consol Procedure Activity Observation SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer, where its type is Procedure Observation Performer (CONF:8251)

Consol Procedure Activity Observation MAY contain [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:8261, CONF:15904, R2.0=CONF:1098-8261, R2.0=CONF:1098-15904) Conforms to Service Delivery Location (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.32)

Consol Procedure Activity Observation MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8272, CONF:8273, CONF:15905) Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ, and Conforms to Instructions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20)

Consol Procedure Activity Observation MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8276, CONF:8277, CONF:15906) Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON, and Conforms to Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19)

Consol Procedure Activity Observation MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8279, CONF:8280, CONF:15907) Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP, and Conforms to Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)
Consol Procedure Activity Observation MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship, where its type is Entry Relationship (CONF:8264, R2.0=CONF:1098-8264)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root=""
SHALL conform to CDA Performer2
Consol Procedure Observation Performer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity, where its type is Procedure Observation Assigned Entity (CONF:8252)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root=""
SHALL conform to CDA Assigned Entity
Consol Procedure Observation Assigned Entity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8253, R2.0=CONF:1098-8253)
Consol Procedure Observation Assigned Entity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:8254)
Consol Procedure Observation Assigned Entity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:8255)

Consol Procedure Observation Assigned Entity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] representedOrganization, where its type is Procedure Observation Represented Organization (CONF:8256, R2.0=CONF:1098-8256)
SHALL conform to CDA Organization
Consol Procedure Observation Represented Organization SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:8257, R2.0=CONF:1098-8257)
Consol Procedure Observation Represented Organization MAY contain zero or more [0..*] name (CONF:8258, R2.0=CONF:1098-8258)
Consol Procedure Observation Represented Organization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:8260, R2.0=CONF:1098-8260)
Consol Procedure Observation Represented Organization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:8259, R2.0=CONF:1098-8259)
SHALL conform to CDA Entry Relationship
Consol Entry Relationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8266, R2.0=CONF:1098-8266)
Consol Entry Relationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:8265, R2.0=CONF:1098-8265)
Consol Entry Relationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] encounter, where its type is Procedure Observation Encounter (CONF:8267, R2.0=CONF:1098-8267)
Consol Procedure Observation Encounter MAY satisfy: Set the encounter ID to the ID of an encounter in another section to signify they are the same encounter. (CONF:16847, R2.0=CONF:1098-16847)
SHALL conform to CDA Encounter
Consol Procedure Observation Encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ENC" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8268, R2.0=CONF:1098-8268)
Consol Procedure Observation Encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8269, R2.0=CONF:1098-8269)
Consol Procedure Observation Encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:8270, R2.0=CONF:1098-8270)
